input.title: Input Options
input.description: Specify the location of the data to use for training, as well as the folder in which to save the trained model.

train_path.title: Training data folder
train_path.description: Folder containing data for training the model
train_path.help_text: Data can be generated using the XXX workflow (link).

valid_path.title: Validation data folder
valid_path.description: Folder containing validation data for the model training
valid_path.help_text: Data can be generated using the XXX workflow (link).

training_options.title: Training Options
training_options.help_text: Make sure that chunk size corresponds to what was used in the data curation step...

batch_size.description: Minibatch size for neural network training. Note: larger batch size will require more memory.

kmer_model.description: Specify the kmer length to be used: either 5- (for 002 kit) or 9- mers (for 004 kit).

epochs.description: Number of epochs to be used when training the model
epochs.help_text: This refers to the number of 'passes' to do over the training set. Note: higher values will result in longer training time.

model_name.description: If you wish, you can specify a name for the model.
